Package index

All functions

RW2()
Specify a random walk model for the age effect
Spline()
Specify a P-spline model for an age effect
TimeFixed()
Specify time trends: age pattern fixed
TimeVarying()
Specify time trends: age pattern changes
augment(<BayesRates_results>)
Obtain estimates of rates, combined with original data
cn_divorces
Divorces in China
cn_population
Adult population in China
components(<BayesRates_results>)
Extract components from a results object
n_draw() `n_draw<-`()
Get and set the number of draws from the posterior distribution
nz_age_width_df
Widths of age groups used with divorce data for New Zealand
nz_divorces
Divorces in New Zealand
nz_divorces_2020
Divorces in New Zealand in 2020
nz_population
Adult population of New Zealand
nz_population_2020
Adult population of New Zealand in 2020
smooth_age()
Smooth rates over age
smooth_agetime()
Smooth rates over age and time
total_rate()
Summarise rates by adding up over the life time
